    • McGregor VS Aldo

    McGregor knocks out Aldo in 13 seconds and becomes the Featherweight champion

    McGregor VS Alvarez

    McGregor knocks out Alvarez in the second round and becomes the first person to hold two titles at the same time in UFC history

    McGregor VS Diaz

    McGregor beats Diaz after a five round war and avenges his first loss in the UFC

    McGregor VS Cowboy Ceronne

    McGregor knocks out Cowboy Cerrone in 40 seconds in his return bout
